sources.title: The Cure | Full Movie | Thriller Sci-Fi Conspiracy | Corporate Coverup
sources.description:
The Cure | Full Movie - A young female researcher whose life is in danger when she discovers the pharmaceutical company she works for had developed a cure for cancer many years earlier. They haven't released it because that would destroy their chemotherapy drug sales. She must now escape and release the cure to world while the company tries to stop her.
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***
2014.  Stars: Antonia Prebble, Stephen Lovatt, Daniel Lissing

metadata.Plot: Having just moved to a new town, Erik (Brad Renfro) is thrilled when he makes friends with his younger neighbor, Dexter (Joseph Mazzello), and his friendly mom (Annabella Sciorra). Despite the disapproval of his own neglectful mother (Diana Scarwid), Erik grows close to Dexter, who suffers from AIDS. As the disease's impact on Dexter's life grows more noticeable, Erik and Dexter embark on a quest to New Orleans down the Mississippi River, where hope may yet lie with a doctor there.
metadata.Actors: Joseph Mazzello, Brad Renfro, Aeryk Egan
